level.heading: Issuance of rules for programs established pursuant to § 38- 912.
level.text: The Board of Education may issue rules necessary for the implementation and operation of programs of education and training as may be established by the Board pursuant to § 38-912.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-172, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-912.
